mixed-citation.article-title: Atlas of European millipedes 3: Order Chordeumatida (Class Diplopoda)

tp:treatment-sec.p:
Including Acherosomatidae Verhoeff, 1929 (= Haasiidae Hoffman, 1980 ), Biokoviellidae Mršić, 1992 , and Macrochaetosomatinae Mršić, 1992, following
Antić et al. (2015a
, 2016). All 32 species live in ( S ) W and SE Europe.
